title: OpenCL Support for TensorFlow -- When is official support coming for macOS?
body_html: When will an official build of TensorFlow for the latest release be available for use with OpenCL-enabled graphics cards? Should I fork a version and then hope to commit? Is this something the core team is interested in because I have a NVIDIA-enabled iMac that is >3 years old and I cannot accelerate my computation for different projects. What is possible within the next year?
